item.title: Mapping your Cloud Assets using Google's APIs in Go
item.description: If you’ve used Google’s Cloud, you’ve probably encountered their commandline tool. While you can achieve many things using just the web cloud console, the gcloud command line tool is flexible, scriptable, and (once you know how to use it), quicker than the console.
